title: Ultrasound surgery -- healing without cuts
description: Imagine having a surgery with no knives involved. At TEDMED, Yoav Medan shares a technique that uses MRI to find trouble spots and focused ultrasound to treat such issues as brain lesions, uterine fibroids and several kinds of cancerous growths.
author: Yoav Medan
keywords: TED, talks, health care, medical research, medicine, science, technology, biotech, engineering, sound, neuroscience, future, innovation, physics, medical imaging
